synopsis.text:
Grand Trooper and the Super Robot Gravion Unite Against the Zeravire Threat!

The world is once again under attack by the relentless Zeravire forces, and the Earthgertz team must rise to the occasion to defend humanity. After successfully deploying Gravion's ultimate attack, the team thought they had vanquished the Zeravire, but alas, the threat has resurfaced.

In response, the Earth Federation Alliance (EFA) has begun developing their own weapon, the Grand Trooper, to combat the Zeravire. As the EFA and Earthgertz join forces, they must confront their past and unravel the mysteries surrounding the Zeravire.

Meanwhile, Eiji, Togo, Leele, Mizuki, Luna, and Ena, the brave pilots of Gravion, continue their daily lives, balancing their responsibilities as defenders of the planet with their duties as maids. With the Zeravire threat looming, the crew must find a way to enjoy life while battling robotic invaders and showing up their rivals, the elite G-Soldier Squadron.

Can the Earthgertz team and the EFA successfully fend off the Zeravire and protect the future of mankind? Join the adventure and find out!
